review_text: Ask me why I will never own one of these???  Because it is a hack-able device that has a microphone and is connected to the internet...  If you want someone listening to you every conversation then please order one of these!!!
review_title: Would I buy one of these?

review_text: This sale was atrocious, I was clicking 'Add to Cart' every 2 seconds, it kept saying: "scanning deal" or something to that effect. Then it went from 0 to 100% claimed in under 2 minutes as I was trying to get the dang thing into my cart. I wanted this for my dad's birthday and now I'm going to have to pay the full 180$.
review_title: Device is amazing, PrimeDay sale was ATROCIOUS.

review_text: I see you have this item for 89.00 now. Looks like I should get a credit.
review_title: Looks like I should get a credit

review_text: Prime day very disappointing.  One of Amazon's premier products and you can't get it at the listed special offer.  Is is Prime Day... or Prime Hour…Minutes?  If you advertise Prime Day your own Flagship devices should be available for the day … IMO.

I was charged a $20 restocking fee for returning a new, unused Echo in its original packaging. It may be the greatest product ever, but Amazon customer service let me down. UPDATE: Amazon refunded the restocking fee 10 months after the fact. I've revised my rating up to two stars.
review_title: It may be the greatest product ever

review_text: It was good and bad when ibsneezed it didnt bless me so i shot with my 22

Like others have experienced, I also didn't get one after my husband and I were waiting and waiting for it to show up online.  When it did, I only managed to get on the waitlist-- my husband didn't even get that. Being on the waitlist ended up being worthless since I never got notified of it being available again, despite literally sitting on my computer all day, minus short 5-minute respites.  Terribly disappointing, and it was even more frustrating to be offered to purchase one for $179 instead. My husband wanted to get me one for my birthday later this month, but I won't let him buy one for the $179 after missing out on this deal and wasting all day. I realize that there was a limit to the number offered, but obviously that number was way too small, upsetting a lot of very loyal Prime members. It's really a shame to cause that amount of ill-will.
